PHRASE.LANG: Hope you worked out how to get the Gothic Table. Otherwise you'll have nowhere to put these… [#Legal]
En espérant que vous avez pu obtenir la table gothique ; sinon vous n'aurez nulle part où les mettre… [#Legal]
Hoffentlich hast du herausgefunden, wie du den gotischen Tisch bekommst. Sonst hast du nichts, worauf die die Vase stellen kannst ... [#Legal]
Spero che tu sappia come procurarti il Tavolo gotico. Altrimenti non saprai dove appoggiarle… [#Legal]
Espero que hayas adivinado cómo conseguir la mesa gótica. Si no, no tendrás dónde ponerlas… [#Legal]
Hope you worked out how to get the Gothic Table. Otherwise you'll have nowhere to put these… [#Legal]
Hope you worked out how to get the Gothic Table. Otherwise you'll have nowhere to put these… [#Legal]
